reviewText: I have not tried this video yet but I am a client of Lawson's at the Fitness Guru and cannot say enough about how incredible she is.  Her training techniques are unbelievably clear and intelligent, resulting in a truly amazing workout that has changed mine and tons of other people's bodies far beyond what we thought was ever possible.  If her instruction in the dvd is as great as it is in person, this will be the best pilates dvd you have ever purchased.
